biryani.text: Let's build the perfect biryani! Click 'Next' to see each delicious layer.
Step 1: Marinated Chicken – juicy, spicy, and packed with flavor. This forms the soul of your biryani.
Step 2: Crispy Fried Onions & Herbs – add golden sweetness, freshness from mint and coriander.
Step 3: Fragrant Basmati Rice & Saffron Milk – perfectly cooked rice with saffron-infused richness.
Step 4: Dum Cooking – layers sealed with ghee and dough, slow-cooked for the ultimate aroma and flavor!

butter-chicken.text: Let's build the perfect Butter Chicken! Click 'Next' to see each delicious layer.
Step 1: Marinated Chicken – tender chunks soaked in yogurt, spices & lemon for bold flavor.
Step 2: Grilled Goodness – smoky, charred chicken cooked till juicy and golden-brown.
Step 3: Step 3: Butter, tomatoes, cream & cashew come together for that iconic silky, tangy base.
Step 5: Simmer & Serve – chicken joins the party, slow-simmered, garnished with coriander!

masala-dosa.text: Let's build the perfect Masala Dosa! Click 'Next' to see each delicious layer.
Step 1: Fermented Dosa Batter – a smooth blend of soaked rice and urad dal, fermented overnight for that tangy, airy crisp.
Step 2: Crispy Golden Dosa – batter spread thin on a hot tawa, sizzling into a golden, crunchy crepe.
Step 3: Spiced Potato Filling – mashed potatoes sautéed with mustard seeds, curry leaves, onions & turmeric—warm and comforting.
Step 4: Fold & Serve – potato filling is tucked inside the dosa, served with coconut chutney and tangy sambar!

gujhiya.text: Let’s build the perfect Gujiya! Click 'Next' to see each festive step.
Step 1: Dough Preparation – mix flour and ghee, knead into a soft dough and let it rest.
Step 2: Sweet Filling – roasted khoya mixed with sugar, cardamom, coconut and dry fruits.
Step 3: Shaping the Gujiya – dough rolled, stuffed, folded into half-moons and sealed.
Step 4: Deep Fry & Enjoy – golden-fried gujiyas, crispy outside and sweet inside!

mithai.text: Let’s build the perfect Barfi! Click 'Next' to explore each sweet layer.
Step 1: Cook the Base – mix condensed milk and khoya over low flame until thick and smooth.
Step 2: Flavor & Fold – add cardamom, saffron, or rose water for that classic mithai aroma.
Step 3: Shape & Set – pour into a greased tray, flatten evenly, and let it cool till firm.
Step 4: Garnish & Cut – top with silver leaf, chopped pistachios or almonds, then cut into squares or diamonds!

gulab-jamun.text: Let’s make melt-in-the-mouth Gulab Jamuns! Click 'Next' to follow the sweet journey.
Step 1: Dough Preparation – combine khoya, a bit of flour, and milk to form a soft, smooth dough.
Step 2: Shape & Fry – roll into small balls and deep fry on low heat until golden brown and crisp.
Step 3: Boil water, sugar, cardamom, and rose essence into a fragrant syrup, then soak the golden-fried balls until soft, juicy, and ready to serve!

daal-chawal.text: Let’s build the ultimate comfort meal – Dal Chawal! Click 'Next' to walk through each cozy step.
Step 1: Wash & Boil – clean lentils (toor/moong/masoor), pressure-cook with turmeric and salt until soft and mushy.
Step 2: Tadka Time – sizzle mustard seeds, cumin, garlic, onions, and red chilies in ghee, then pour over the dal.
Step 3: Fluffy Steamed Rice – boil basmati rice till each grain is light, separate, and perfectly cooked.
Step 4: Serve with Love – ladle hot dal over a mound of rice, top with ghee and fresh coriander. Comfort in every bite!

samosa.text: Let's build the perfect Samosa! Click 'Next' to see each delicious layer.
Step 1: Spiced Potato Filling – mashed potatoes mixed with peas, cumin, chili, and a medley of spices.
Step 2: Samosa Dough – crispy and flaky outer covering made from refined flour and ajwain.
Step 3: Shaping the Cone – dough is rolled, filled, and folded into iconic triangle cones.
Step 4: Deep Frying – golden and crunchy samosas sizzling to perfection in hot oil!
